PART I
PRELIMINARY
I. These Regulations may be cited as the Fisheries Regulations,
Title
2012.
Interpretation 2. Jn these Regulations, unless the context otherwise requires­
" commercial fishing area " means an area designated as
S.IoNfo . such under the Fisheries (Commercial Fishing Areas)
2011 (Declaration) Order, 2011;
" commercial fishing" means fishing which is undertaken in
a commercial fishing area as a regular or occasional
occupation for the supply of fish to any market or industry;
" fish " has the meaning assigned to it in the Act;
"fish product" means any human food product in which fish
is a characterising ingredient;
" Kutumpula " means any fishing method whereby fish are
driven into a stationery net or monofilament net or trap;
"process monitoring instrument" means an instrument or
device used to indicate conditions during fish processing at
a critical control point;
" processing " means, with respect to fish or fish products,
handling, storing, preparing, heading, eviscerating, freezing,
changing into different market forms, manufacturing,
preserving, packing, labelling, unloading and loading; and
"sanitary and phytosanitary certificate" means the certificate
that permits an inspection authority to attest to the status
of an animal, plant or fish product with respect to hygiene,
freedom from disease or insect pests, and provides basic
details about the means of conveyance of that product.
